forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers this afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers this afternoon. High 63F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 45F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 56F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.
